name: KNIGHT SIMULATOR 1400
description:
yeah so if you hit him once and it didn't quite work just try to hit him again or something so that he feels it this time and if you play this game for long enough your arm will get stronger but only part of your arm will because clicking the mouse button isn't a very good workout but it will work if you do it for long enough it will eventually work I think

I mean metal doesn't slice through metal so it's very important to study the history of our continents for to make sure so history doesn't repeat itself and if you want to watch media with horrifyingly bad armor you can get that from Hollywood but if instead you can get horrifyingly bad sword here too so yeah
